org.gvsig.fmap.dal.coverage.store

Interface PyramidRasterStore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RasterDataStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRasterDataStore, DefaultRasterStore, DefaultRemoteRasterStore

    public interface PyramidRasterStore
    Methods for raster data stores with resolution levels

    • Method Detail

      • getCoordsInTheNearestLevel

        Extent getCoordsInTheNearestLevel(Extent extent,
                                int w,
                                int h)
        Calculates the extent of a zoom level using other extent as a reference. This function is useful when the request is between two levels. It will adjust the request to the nearest zoom level.
        Parameters:
        level -
        extent -
        w -
        h -
        Returns:
